title: Biden reaches decision on Supreme Court nominee, after vow to name a Black woman to the high court
description: President Joe Biden, who recently narrowed his focus to three judges, vowed to name a Black woman to the high court by the end of February.
content: WASHINGTON – President Joe Biden has made a decision on his first nomination to the Supreme Court to replace retiring Justice Stephen Breyer, two sources familiar with the process told USA TODAY Thur… [+1349 chars]
